products.name: Bread
products.description: This bread is healthy and delicious. Enjoy your breakfast.

products.name: Maracuja
products.description: Passiflora edulis is a vine species of passion flower that is native to southern Brazil through Paraguay to northern Argentina.

products.name: Coconut
products.description: The coconut tree (Cocos nucifera) is a member of the family Arecaceae (palm family) and the only species of the genus Cocos. The term coconut can refer to the whole coconut palm or the seed, or the fruit, which, botanically, is a drupe, not a nut.
